chapter: Symptoms and Clinical Manifestations in Psychiatry
description: Psychopathology, hallucinations, delusions, and clinical signs

questions.question: A patient is mute and immobile but conscious. He is unresponsive to the environment. How would you describe his state?
questions.explanation: A patient is said to be in a stupor when he is conscious but mute, immobile, and unresponsive to the environment.
